editor.fontFamily: 'Hack Nerd Font Mono', 'Droid Sans Mono', 'monospace', monospace, 'Droid Sans Fallback'
C_Cpp.clang_format_style: {BasedOnStyle: LLVM, IndentWidth: 4, SpaceAfterTemplateKeyword: false, AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations: true, BinPackArguments: false, AllowAllParametersOfDeclarationOnNextLine: true, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: false, BreakBeforeBinaryOperators: "NonAssignment"}
